description.text:
At 7th level, a cleaner can cast misdirection on himself at will. This lasts until the cleaner uses the ability again or ends the effect as a standard action.
This ability replaces stalker.
Slayer Talents: The following slayer talents (and rogue talents) complement the cleaner archetype: camouflage, fast stealth, foil scrutiny*, rogue crawl, surprise attack, and terrain mastery.
